Changes For 1.1.1
[LittleDog Historic Changes]

Changes

This section describes all API and user-visible changes between LittleDog release 1.1.0 and LittleDog release 1.1.1.

LittleDog

  • enum NUM_TERRAINS was increased from 27 to 703. This is described below.
  • enum LittleDog::TerrainID's range was expanded to additionally include TERRAIN_AA to TERRAIN_ZZ. Specifically, terrains from [AA, AB, AC, ... AZ, BA, BB, BC, ... BZ, CA, CB, CC, ... CZ, ... ZZ] were "effectively" appended to the previous list, which already included [NONE, A, B, C, ... Z]. Internal support is now provided for these new terrains. The previous NUM_TERRAINS value was 27, and the new NUM_TERRAINS value is 703 (= 1 + 26*27). Although only TERRAIN_AA through TERRAIN_AZ newly appear in file littledog.h, the value range of LittleDog::TerrainID now spans from 0 to 702.
  • enum MAX_MARKERS was increased from 50 to 80.
  • enum MAX_TERRAINS was increased from 5 to 8.

Generated on Wed Dec 31 14:18:26 2008 for LittleDog API by  1.3.9.1
